PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-10282024-09-20162019JUS
ActAn Act to amend the Divorce Act, the Family Orders and Agreements Enforcement Assistance Act and the Garnishment, Attachment and Pension Diversion Act and to make consequential amendments to another Act
SubjectOrder Fixing December 1, 2024 as the Day on Which Section 22.1 of An Act to amend the Divorce Act, the Family Orders and Agreements Enforcement Assistance Act and the Garnishment, Attachment and Pension Diversion Act and to make consequential amendments to another Act Come into Force in British Columbia
PrecisOrder fixing December 1, 2024 as the day on which section 22.1 of AN ACT TO AMEND THE DIVORCE ACT, THE FAMILY ORDERS AND AGREEMENTS ENFORCEMENT ASSISTANCE ACT AND THE GARNISHMENT, ATTACHMENT AND PENSION DIVERSION ACT AND TO MAKE CONSEQUENTIAL AMENDMENTS TO ANOTHER ACT, chapter 16 of the Statutes of Canada, 2019, COMES INTO FORCE in order to bring into force the language rights provision under the amended Divorce Act in Britsh Columbia.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order fixing December 1, 2024 as the day on which section 22.1 of AN ACT TO AMEND THE DIVORCE ACT, THE FAMILY ORDERS AND AGREEMENTS ENFORCEMENT ASSISTANCE ACT AND THE GARNISHMENT, ATTACHMENT AND PENSION DIVERSION ACT AND TO MAKE CONSEQUENTIAL AMENDMENTS TO ANOTHER ACT, chapter 16 of the Statutes of Canada, 2019, COMES INTO FORCE in order to bring into force the language rights provision under the amended Divorce Act in Britsh Columbia.
